involvements.title: Maritime DevCon
involvements.description: This year I attended Maritime DevCon, a developer conference and networking event in Fredericton, New Brunswick, Canada. I was able to network with a lot of cool industry professionals from around the area and attended some information sessions.

involvements.title: Tournament Organizer - Super Smash Bros.
involvements.description: I am a passionate fan of the video game Super Smash Brothers Melee and the fan community around it. As a result, I took an a leadership role in the community and starting organizing large regional tournaments and weekly competitions. While I also like competing in the tournaments myself, I like organizing them to make sure all attendees have a good experience.

involvements.title: Vice President - Neill House
involvements.description: In my second year of University, I was fortunate to be elected Vice President of my on campus residence. With this opportunity, I was able to help lead a team of 11 members to plan events for incoming students throughout the whole school year.
